name: Rebuilding Together San Francisco
description: Rebuilding Together San Francisco works to preserve affordable housing and non-profit community facilities throughout the city. House by house, and block by block, RTSF is helping to keep people in their homes, revitalize low income neighborhoods and maintain the city’s diverse character by providing free building repair, modification, clean-up, and renovation work to community members. RTSF is a local affiliate of Rebuilding Together, a national organization that includes 130 affiliates serving
